definition: lit. if you have to use force to break a melon off the vine, it won't taste sweet (because it's only when the melon is ripe that it can be removed with just a slight twist) (idiom)/fig. if sth is not meant to be, it's no use trying to force it to happen
pinyin: qiang3 niu3 de5 gua1 bu4 tian2

definition: strong/powerful/better/slightly more than/vigorous/violent/best in their category, e.g. see 百強|百强[bai3 qiang2]
variant of 強|强[jiang4]
variant of 強|强[qiang3]
to force/to compel/to strive/to make an effort
variant of 強|强[qiang2]
surname Qiang
stubborn/unyielding
to turn/to twist/to wring/to sprain/to swing one's hips
see 的士[di1 shi4]
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
aim/clear

melon/gourd/squash

sweet
to insist on/to demand/to impose
both sides are willing/by mutual consent

definition: to part without hard feelings (idiom)/to cut the knot as smoothly as you tied it
lit. a good horse doesn't turn around and graze the same patch again (idiom)/fig. once you've moved on, don't go back again (romantic relationship, job etc)/leave the past behind
pinyin: hao3 ma3 bu4 chi1 hui2 tou2 cao3

definition: there are plenty more fish in the sea (idiom)
pinyin: tian1 ya2 he2 chu4 wu2 fang1 cao3

definition: destined to meet but not fated to be together (idiom)
(of a couple) to be harmonious/to be each other's sunshine
lit. one palm alone cannot clap (proverb)/fig. it takes two persons to start a dispute/it takes two to tango/it's difficult to achieve anything without support
pinyin: yi1 ge5 ba1 zhang3 pai1 bu4 xiang3

definition: you should not covet your friend's wife (idiom)
pinyin: peng2 you5 qi1 bu4 ke3 qi1

definition: to both be willing/mutual consent
younger generations will do all right on their own (idiom)
pinyin: er2 sun1 zi4 you3 er2 sun1 fu2

definition: if you marry a chicken follow the chicken, if you marry a dog follow the dog (idiom)
pinyin: jia4 ji1 sui2 ji1 , jia4 gou3 sui2 gou3

definition: to let go one's hold/to give up/to have a free hand

definition: to mediate/to urge peace
